Beats

Discover the Power of Beats: Revolutionising Cloud-Based Applications for Education and Research

Beats is an innovative suite of cloud applications built on a shared software core, developed by the Dutch company Eumedianet. Tailored for the educational and research sectors, Beats delivers cutting-edge tools designed to enhance productivity and simplify complex tasks—all without the need for extensive local IT infrastructure.

Secure Video: A breakthrough solution for behavioural scientists and researchers, Secure Video allows professionals to assess and interpret human and animal behaviours with precision. From analysing subtle behavioural patterns to conducting forensic interviews with suspects, Secure Video combines multiple data sources and synchronises them within a robust, Hollywood-grade video security environment. The result? A powerful, reliable tool that meets the highest research standards. There are several AI solutions with this applications, like object tracking and speech-to-text and vv.

DIY Booth: Empowering educators, the DIY Booth enables university staff—especially non-technical users like lecturers—to produce professional-quality video content with ease. From lecture clips to complete video series, this application ensures that creating engaging, high-quality educational materials has never been more accessible.

Affordable Multi-Feed Recording: Beats also includes an application for cost-effective scheduling and recording of multiple video feeds, such as those from lecture halls. This streamlined solution makes it easy for institutions to capture and archive valuable content without breaking the budget.
Why Choose Beats?
  • 100% Cloud-Based: No local IT infrastructure required, making deployment simple and scalable.
  • Custom-Built for Education: Applications tailored to meet the unique needs of educators and researchers.
  • Cost-Effective Solutions: Advanced functionality without the high price tag.


With Beats, Eumedianet delivers a game-changing platform that empowers educators, researchers, and institutions to achieve more, faster. Step into the future of education and research with Beats—where innovation meets simplicity.

Nvolve Group

G120

Nvolve is a learning and development platform created for enterprise and industrial environments. With features built for wet and harsh environments like audit-compliant wet signatures and on-tablet learning delivery, the Nvolve platform’s features are underpinned by understanding the primary challenges facing large enterprise and industrial employers when facing audits, compliance demands and regulatory pressures.

For over 15 years, Nvolve has been helping Manufacturing and Supply Chain companies accelerate their workforce enablement and engagement by improving productivity, quality and safety through the development of robust industry ready digital tools.

Unlike many other monolithic learning management platforms, the Nvolve platform modules function together to give rapid training setup and deployment, greater analysis and cohesive reporting across multiple business units.

The value of the Nvolve platform is easy to see in the engagement and effectiveness of staff, the ability to manage disparate multi-language workers, and how it helps customers to avoid non-compliance instances and their high financial cost.

Nvolve is a modular platform that includes modules for employee enablement and employee engagement, sustainability and ESG driven by actionable and meaningful analytics to inform decision making and close gaps.

Nvolve customer feedback reveals that users of the platform find significant value and ROI from features like the instant translations in static and multimedia content, ESG dashboards, paperless document management, time savings in setting up training events and the vastly reduced experience of downtime due to mobile accessible content and on-the-job training capabilities.

Another aspect regarded as high value by Nvolve’s users, is the responsive and helpful client support, ensuring that all Nvolve users are attaining their full potential with the system within their workplaces. With experience across a wide-ranging variety of industrial business types, the support team are fully enabled to respond rapidly to any and all requests for help, which is often an afterthought with so many providers in the crowded LMS market.

Chosen by a rapidly growing number of global multi-site clients and instantly recognisable brands across food manufacturing, manufacturing, logistics and packaging, Nvolve is an LMS that’s built different. Some start their search for an LMS but those that choose Nvolve, find a solution to every workplace training and engagement issue they face on a day-to-day basis.

WorldSkills UK is a four nations partnership between education, industry and UK governments. It is a world-class skills network acting as a catalyst for:

  • raising standards, through international benchmarking and professional development
  • championing future skills, through analysis of rapidly changing economic demand
  • empowering young people, from all backgrounds, through competitions-based training and careers advocacy.

We are working to help the UK become a ‘skills economy’, boosting the prestige of technical and professional education by embedding world-class training standards across the UK to help drive investment, jobs and economic growth.

About the WorldSkills UK Learning Lab

We recognise that developing high-quality lesson plans is time consuming, that’s why at WorldSkills UK we have created ready-to teach resources and assessment tools to help you embed world-class standards in teaching and learning, completely free of charge.

The WorldSkills UK Learning Lab offers a range of sector specific resources and skills assessment tools in one easy to navigate virtual learning platform.   Enrich curriculum planning and delivery with transformative approaches to teaching, learning and assessment, and benchmarking against the WorldSkills UK National Standard of Excellence. Build confidence and mindset skills with masterclasses and scenarios based on world-class practice from elite sports training, and introduce principles of lean management to improve efficiency and quality of work and how its applied across sectors with productivity skills activities. The Learning Lab allows educators to register learners to the platform, assign resources, benchmark learners assessment against the national standards and track their progress to report on skills development.  Additionally, on-demand self-development tools and teacher training is available to build confidence and refresh teaching skills to enhance practice.

TeamLytica

TeamLytica: Elevating Team Dynamics for Optimal Performance and Well-being

Introduction:

In the competitive landscape of business, the effectiveness of team dynamics is a pivotal factor in achieving success. TeamLytica stands at the forefront of this arena, offering a transformative web-based application that reshapes how business teams understand and optimise their function. We aim to enhance team productivity, morale, cohesion, and well-being through insightful, practical solutions.

Company History:

Born from the vision of experienced managers, TeamLytica was established to address the gap in practical, management-focused team analysis tools. Initially serving UK-based clients such as Boeing, Natwest and Lockheed Martin, we can now service any international clients where English is spoken. Our approach is rooted in simplicity and accessibility, steering away from complex academic methodologies and focusing on what truly matters in everyday team management.

What We Do:

TeamLytica’s application is a cutting-edge web-based tool designed to measure and improve key aspects of team performance. We focus on critical areas such as stress levels, morale, and overall team dynamics. By evaluating these factors, our platform offers actionable insights that help teams enhance their performance and overall well-being.

Our solution is particularly beneficial for learning and development professionals. It enables them to compare multiple teams within their organisation, identifying best practices and shared challenges. This comparative analysis is crucial in pinpointing areas that require more support, allowing learning and development strategies to be tailored effectively. By highlighting shared weaknesses and strengths across teams, our platform aids in prioritising interventions and resource allocation, ensuring that support is directed where it’s most needed.

All reports can be supported with coaching and training for managers and teams.

Out Team360 explores the views of those external to the team and compares every metric, giving deep insights into where development and support are required.

Uniquely, we also try and solve the challenges of proving ROI. Our Benchmark report allows teams to retest 3-6 months later, allowing them to compare every metric. This will show you how effective support for that team has been and there to focus next.

At TeamLytica, we understand the evolving needs of modern teams. Our platform is more than just a measurement tool; it is a catalyst for change, fostering an environment where teams can thrive in performance and well-being.

Cranfield School of Management is one of the oldest business schools in Europe. As part of Cranfield University, one of a handful of UK’s only wholly postgraduate universities, we are uniquely placed to connect technology and leadership. We are globally recognised for our excellence in leadership development and for our powerful commercial links and real-world focus.

Cranfield School of Management offers powerful postgraduate courses, be it full-time, part-time, or online. Cranfield Online melds together the best of academic theory, with real-world practice. Delivered via bite-sized modules, these micro-credentials can build to an online Master’s.

Vedubox

A290

Vedubox is a comprehensive learning management system (LMS) designed to facilitate effective online learning and interaction between organisations and their users. This dynamic e-learning platform seamlessly integrates with popular video conferencing tools such as Zoom, Webex, and Google Meet, ensuring smooth communication and collaboration.

Vedubox offers a broad array of features that cater to various aspects of online learning. These include:

  • Live Training Management: This feature allows you to schedule live training sessions for your team, with automatic notifications sent to attendees via SMS and email. It also keeps a record of these live training sessions, enabling comprehensive reporting of the entire process.
  • Interactive Video Training: This feature offers a more visually engaging learning experience, which can significantly improve information retention.
  • Advanced Reporting: With this tool, organisations can track attendance, progress, and performance, aiding in continuously improving their training programs.
  • Testing Capabilities: Vedubox offers a Question Bank, Quizzes, and Exams, allowing users to assess their learning progress and understanding of the material.
  • Course Sale Module & Online Payment Receiving: This feature streamlines the process of selling and purchasing courses.
  • Gamification: This introduces a fun and competitive element to learning, which can significantly boost user engagement and motivation.
  • Certification: Upon course completion, users can receive certificates, which can be a powerful motivator and a testament to their learning.
  • Watch Again Library: This feature automatically records live lessons, enabling users to revisit them at their convenience. This self-paced review mechanism helps reinforce understanding and mastery of the course material.
  • Mobile App: This ensures that learning can happen anytime and anywhere, increasing accessibility and convenience.

In addition to these, Vedubox offers many other features, making it a versatile and powerful tool for online learning.

Eintech’s online assessment platform Rogo© is used by large corporations, awarding organisations, EPAOs and training providers for question authoring, item banking, test publishing, test delivery, remote invigilation, online marking, marker management and results analysis in over 180 countries.  

Background
We established Eintech to provide agile, flexible and cost-effective e-Assessment solutions. Our aim is to continually develop our main software platform and alongside this, expand our service and support offering. Our purpose is to help our clients’ productivity by providing a software platform that saves them time, provides better information and allows them to do more.

We are now planning our next stage of growth and are undertaking a comprehensive review of our Rogo e-Assessment platform, in order to remain at the forefront of computer-based testing and learning.

Products and Services
We developed our proprietary software Rogo©, as a customisable e-Assessment and e-Learning delivery system. With multiple testing options and rich media integration, practice tests and examinations can be designed and published for delivery anywhere in the world.  Rogo provides speedy and efficient item banking, test publishing and results management and integrates with existing software and processes. In addition, the system is agile, takes advantage of the most up-to-date development tools and secure online hosting technology and is able to adapt quickly, to changing client, regulatory and market requirements.

Rogo is a powerful, scalable web-based platform that requires no local installation and above all is easy to use. It enables users to rapidly deploy tests globally, providing reduced distribution costs, reduced environmental impact, reduced time between test compilation to delivery and increased security.

Coursera

Coursera was launched in 2012 by two Stanford Computer Science professors, Andrew Ng and Daphne Koller, with a mission to provide universal access to world-class learning. It is now one of the largest online learning platforms in the world, with 100 million registered learners as of April 2022.
Coursera partners with over 250 leading university and industry partners to offer a broad catalogue of content and credentials, including courses, Specializations, Professional Certificates, Guided Projects, and bachelor’s and master’s degrees.

Institutions around the world use Coursera to upskill and reskill their employees, citizens, and students in fields such as data science, technology, and business. Coursera became a B Corp in February 2021.

Training Orchestra

J110

Training Orchestra’s award-winning Training Management Software (TMS) is a scheduling system to automate and optimise classroom and virtual classroom training operations including: session scheduling, resource management, instructor calendars and collaboration, cost tracking, reporting and more.

As a complement to the LMS, Training Orchestra replaces manual processes and spreadsheets to help corporate L&D, training companies and associations to increase resource use, optimise session scheduling and track and control costs in real-time. Organisations will gain control over their training operations so they can, “train more with less.”

With over 600 customers globally, the Training Orchestra TMS adapts to meet your operation’s unique needs, supporting the entire training process from planning and budgeting, scheduling and logistics, to sales and reporting for the most complex situations including multi-languages, currencies and time zones as well as managing training regulations at the state, country, and industry level

Quadmark

Who are we?

Quadmark is a creative training agency that has been at the cutting edge of training design and delivery for the last 20 years. Our passion for learning is the foundation of our business. We develop collaborative relationships with our clients and partners, and we’re proud of our 97% customer satisfaction score. Our training programs have been taken by 100K+ learners in over 50 countries worldwide. We are a team of tech lovers, GIF sharers, and the proud parents of our dogs, cats, birds, kids, plants and gadgets. We are collaborative, supportive, and have a people-centric, inclusive environment where everyone can do their best work.

What do we do?

At Quadmark, we deliver powerful learning solutions for your people, partners, and customers. With a learner-centric approach, our training is designed for the best learner experience and outcomes. Our tailored solutions support L&D, People, and Sales enablement teams to attract and retain talent, drive sales, and implement lasting change.

How do we ensure project success?

Our talented team of creatives, writers, strategists, project managers, and trainers work with you to deliver impactful learning. Our approach has four crucial stages:
  • Discover: We assess your business opportunities and challenges to understand your training needs and the learner behaviors you want to change
  • Design: We design creative training solutions based on proven learning theory to engage your learners and align with your business goals.
  • Develop: Our team of learning experts creates innovative training programs that exceed expectations.
  • Evaluate: We are passionate about learning. We review every project against the measures of success to make it even better next time.

CPD Standards Office

Elevating Professional Development

The CPD Standards Office is a globally recognised accreditation organisation dedicated to enhancing the quality and effectiveness of Continuing Professional Development (CPD). As leaders in the CPD accreditation field, we are committed to supporting and certifying training providers, corporate organisations, and individual professionals who strive for excellence in their professional development initiatives.

Founded on the principles of rigorous standards and continuous improvement, The CPD Standards Office offers a robust accreditation process that ensures CPD activities meet the highest quality benchmarks. Our mission is to foster a culture of lifelong learning where professionals across various industries can achieve their career goals through validated, high-quality training and development.

Our Services At The CPD Standards Office, we provide comprehensive accreditation services for a wide range of CPD activities, including training courses, workshops, seminars, conferences, e-learning modules, and coaching sessions. Our rigorous evaluation process assesses the quality, relevance, and impact of these activities, ensuring they effectively contribute to participants’ professional growth and development.

Why Choose The CPD Standards Office?

Quality Assurance: The accreditation process is based on stringent criteria that guarantee the highest standards of CPD activities. We ensure that accredited providers deliver content that is relevant, engaging, and beneficial for professional development.

Credibility and Trust: CPD accreditation from The CPD Standards Office is a mark of excellence. It enhances the credibility of training providers and instils confidence in learners and corporate clients.

Global Recognition: Our accreditation is internationally recognised, making it a valuable asset for professionals and organisations aiming to expand their reach and impact.

Continuous Support: We offer ongoing support to our accredited members, including access to best practice resources, marketing tools, and networking opportunities to help them thrive in the competitive CPD landscape.

Join Us at The World of Learning Expo

Meet our team of experts, explore our accreditation process, and discover the benefits of becoming a CPD-accredited provider.

Cinema8 provides a comprehensive suite of tools designed to enhance e-learning through interactive video solutions. Our platform equips e-learning designers with the necessary tools to create dynamic, personalised learning paths using features such as video branching, gamification, and real-time interactivity.

Interactive Video Creation: Utilise our intuitive drag-and-drop Interaction Designer to create engaging e-learning content with quizzes, polls, and branching scenarios. Our extensive widget library simplifies the design of interactive elements that enrich the learning experience.

Personalised Learning Journeys: Customise learning paths for individual learners with dynamic video branching and conditional actions, fostering deeper engagement and understanding.

Seamless Integration: Cinema8 integrates effortlessly with Learning Management Systems (LMS) and supports SCORM/LTI exports, ensuring smooth implementation and management of e-learning content. Advanced Analytics: Track and analyse learner performance with our comprehensive analytics suite, providing insights that help educators refine and enhance their courses. Gamification and Engagement: Motivate learners with gamification features such as leaderboards, badges, and rewards, encouraging friendly competition and active participation.

Thinking Focus

C100

Learning professionals face unprecedented challenges adapting to the new world. Unfortunately, the need for solutions that retain engagement and deliver frontline impact is hard to find.

Time is limited for everyone, and learning professionals want high-impact solutions that are literally ready out-of-the-box. Additionally, learning is lost within a week when not applied, so the need for robust solutions is essential.

At Thinking Focus, we addressed these very challenges in 2017. We created the award-winning ‘What Would You Do?’ (WWYD) social learning experience that blends psychology and gamification with group coaching to prepare people for those moments of truth. If not handled well, those moments lead to escalation with time and costs to resolve.

WWYD is available online and offline; choose the content to suit your needs and be ready to play in minutes. It’s flexible to suit any budget and need. So come, play, and see for yourself.

Rising Vibe

B130

Rising Vibe are Culture Consultants, supporting and challenging leadership to create or transform their culture by having the conversations that matter.

Experts in culture; people development and change management, Rising Vibe makes a difference within organisations by bringing organisational goals together with human needs, to enable high performance.

To get the very best out of people, we must consider how they’re feeling as well as hold them to account for organisational results. Rising Vibe delivers learning and development solutions to tackle the problems that our clients face:

  1. People not having the conversations that matter. Not giving feedback, saying what they mean or asking for what they need.
  2. Fear of getting it wrong. Conversations around diversity, inclusion, mental health and performance management are being avoided.
  3. Underperformance as a result of burnout, stress and low resilience. People expected to be agile and do more with less.
  4. False economy thinking. Short-term ‘tick-box’ training rather than investment in strategic learning, development and cultural change.
  5. People not making the change that the organisation needs them to make.
  6. Disconnected Leadership. Senior leaders become removed from the wider organisation.

At Rising Vibe we can help your organisation to take action and start to have the conversations that matter.

Introduction and Company History,

Results Driven Group

The Results Driven Group specialise in bespoke skills training, ILM qualifications and professional development. With over 20 years’ experience RDG have established an excellent reputation for the delivery of highly customised and flexible training, including bespoke Leadership and Management courses/team development and interpersonal skills courses.

Nimble

Established in 2009, Gloucestershire based Nimble Elearning’s mission is to make it super-easy for companies of any size to be empowered to build their own engaging online courses, release them to their teams and track results.

With Nimble, you can provide online training to your teams, easily, and ensure everyone involved in your organisation has the knowledge they need to make it a success!

You can create your own beautiful courses on various topics or hit the ground running with our range of customisable ready-made online courses covering everything from customer service to health and safety. Your learners can access courses on phones, tablets, and desktops – anytime, anywhere! You can then keep track of their progress at the click of a button.

Elearning can be effective for communicating product knowledge; processes and procedures; interactive scenarios to build soft skills; sharing success stories; or even for gathering views via a survey. When speed is of the essence, courses can be viewed by all teams as soon as they’re published.

You can be up and running in minutes – it’s that quick! Our free trial gives you everything you need to see if Nimble is right for you. We also offer a generous 25% charity discount. Whether you’re new to elearning or a training expert, we’re here to help!

Be The Riot

F210

Be The Riot was founded in late 2020 with a mission to provide organisations with interactive inclusion learning workshops and consultancy services to help develop their equity diversity and inclusion strategies. The ultimate goal being organisations that are truly inclusive and reflective of our wonderfully diverse society!

Our vision is a society that is free from inequity and truly representative of the diversity within it. A world where bias doesn’t impact a person’s ability to get on in the workplace and in their career.

We facilitate:

  • EDI Learning sessions
  • EDI Surveys & Focus Groups
  • EDI Health Check & Strategy Building
  • EDI Consultations

Our learning workshops focus on the practical tools needed to create inclusive culture. Topics include:

  • Inclusive Leadership
  • Inclusive Behaviours
  • Antiracism
  • Pride & LGBTQIA+ Inclusion
  • Social Mobility & Anti-classism
  • Inclusive Recruitment
  • Bespoke workshops/webinars (various EDI topics)

We use a collaborative approach, taking the steps needed to understand your organisation and adapting to your needs. We support you on the journey of culture change, providing insights and practical steps to inclusion.

We don’t do box-ticking. The human experience is what’s most important to us so this is what frames our insights and our approach. We aim to centre experiences derived from various aspects of diversity while recognising the impact of intersectionality.
